comments.body: Shoud we move this function to Hook rather than operator?

This is in the operator as per the suggestion from https://github.com/apache/airflow/pull/4903#discussion_r264925228. 

> ... maybe add a payload parameter to the constructor instead of copying the data? The user will provide data in the appropriate format. The operator will only perform appropriate validation.

The hook accepts a `payload` dict parameter, and the operator will do all validation and parameter parsing, which is why the function exists here.
